SpellDB.name: Devastate
SpellDB.description: Strike the target for 10% damage.

SpellDB.name: Intimidating Shout
SpellDB.description: Unleash a terrifying roar, reducing damage to your foes by 20% for 5 sec.

SpellDB.name: Cleave
SpellDB.description: Strikes opponent for 17.5% damage with.

SpellDB.name: Fortify
SpellDB.description: Temporarily increases your armor by 25%, reducing damage dealt to you for 60 sec.

SpellDB.name: Bash
SpellDB.description: Stuns opponent for 5 sec, and deals 10% damage.

SpellDB.name: Hemorrhage
SpellDB.description: Tears open target dealing 5% damage initially, then deals up to 25 damage in 1 min.

SpellDB.name: Stomp
SpellDB.description: Slams the ground, dealing 10 damage to nearby enemy units with a 20% chance to stun for 3 sec.

SpellDB.name: Overpower
SpellDB.description: Strike at the opponent for 15% of damage. Cannot be blocked, dodged, or parried.

SpellDB.name: Frenzy
SpellDB.description: Increases attack speed by 50% and movement by 25%, but deals 5 damage every 5 sec to you. Lasts 120 sec.

SpellDB.name: Searing arrow
SpellDB.description: Shoot a flaming arrow at target that deals up to 25 damage in 75 sec.

SpellDB.name: Concussive shot
SpellDB.description: Hits the target for 10% damage, and dazes the target. Slowing movement and attack speed by 50% for 10 sec.

SpellDB.name: Piercing shot
SpellDB.description: A powerful shot at deals 10% damage that ignores target's armor.

SpellDB.name: Stinging shot
SpellDB.description: Fire a poison tipped arrow dealing 20% damage and 5 damage every 2 sec for 30 sec.

SpellDB.name: Explosive arrow
SpellDB.description: Fire a dynamite tipped arrow at target. When detonated, damages all units in blast radius by 10 damage.

SpellDB.name: Precise shot
SpellDB.description: Aimed shot that deals 15% damage.

SpellDB.name: Sniper shot
SpellDB.description: Fires a well-aimed shot dealing 15% damage. Range of shot increased by 25%.

SpellDB.name: Explosive trap
SpellDB.description: Plant an explosive trap, that'll explode when a unit passes near it. Arms itself in 5 sec, and self-destructs in 30 sec after.

SpellDB.name: Volley
SpellDB.description: Rapidly launch 3 arrows at target dealing 5% damage each arrow.

SpellDB.name: Fireball
SpellDB.description: Hurls a fiery ball that deals 5% of damage and 10 damage over 30 sec.

SpellDB.name: Shadow bolt
SpellDB.description: Sends a shadowy bolt at target, dealing 12% damage.

SpellDB.name: Frost bolt
SpellDB.description: Launches a bolt of frost at enemy. Deals 10% damage and slows target's movement by 30% for 10 sec.

SpellDB.name: Divine heal
SpellDB.description: Restores 10%-30% of health.

SpellDB.name: Siphon mana
SpellDB.description: Drain up to 20% mana from enemy over 10 sec.

SpellDB.name: Haste
SpellDB.description: Increase your movement speed by 50% for 10 sec.

SpellDB.name: Slow
SpellDB.description: Slows target's movement and attack speed by 50% for 15 sec.

SpellDB.name: Arcane bolt
SpellDB.description: Hurl a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 12%, and then a 50% chance to jump to nearby enemies. Affects up to 3 units.

SpellDB.name: Mind blast
SpellDB.description: Blast the target's mind for 20% damage.

SpellDB.name: Meteor
SpellDB.description: Rain down a meteor at target location, dealing 20% damage at target and 5% damage to units within the blast radius.
